name: Caramelized Onion, Red Pepper and Zucchini Frittata
description: Caramelized onions, sauteed red bell peppers and zucchini combined create a winning egg frittata breakfast dish.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 400F. Over medium-low heat, heat oil in a 10-inch skillet. Stir in onion and cook until slightly brown, about 10 minutes. Add peppers and cook 5 more minutes, then add zucchini. Season with salt and pepper and cook 3 more minutes stirring occasionally.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat oven to 400F. Over medium-low heat, heat oil in a 10-inch skillet. Stir in onion and cook until slightly brown, about 10 minutes. Add peppers and cook 5 more minutes, then add zucchini. Season with salt and pepper and cook 3 more minutes stirring occasionally.

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium bowl whisk eggs, Parmesan, salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: In a medium bowl whisk eggs, Parmesan, salt and pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Add eggs to the skillet making sure eggs cover all the vegetables. When the edges begin to set (about 2 minutes) move skillet to oven.
recipeInstructions.name: Add eggs to the skillet making sure eggs cover all the vegetables. When the edges begin to set (about 2 minutes) move skillet to oven.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook about 10-15 minutes, or until frittata is completely cooked.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook about 10-15 minutes, or until frittata is completely cooked.

keywords: breakfast frittata, Caramelized Onion Red Pepper and Zucchini Frittata, frittata recipe, how to make a frittata, zucchini frittata
